Title: BRF Output Formatting Enhancements for Pagination and Accessibility

Description:
Update the BRF (Braille Ready Format) output generator to enforce a strict limit of 40 cells per line to comply with standard tactile display and embossing device constraints.

Test Plan:
Include a regression test case simulating a 1,000-page BRF document, ensuring no overflow occurs beyond 40 cells/line, page numbering remains sequential from 1, and all page breaks render correctly with the "⠿⠿" symbol.

Priority: High
Impact: Prevents tactile display overflow, improves document readability and navigability for visually impaired users, and aligns with assistive device formatting standards.
